body_html:
@xuancong84 btw, it could help troubleshooting if you dumped memory timeline and checked which op is responsible for this extra 1GB allocation, using timeline as here: #6019 (comment)

body:
@xuancong84  btw, it could help troubleshooting if you dumped memory
timeline and checked which op is responsible for this extra 1GB allocation,
using timeline as here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/6019#issuecomment-264544202
